name: Towards Better
description:
CLICK ON THE FULL SCREEN BUTTON

RULES :

Change Direction : ARROW KEYS (left and right)

Jump : SPACE

Collect coins to increase faith (which is the score and won't change anything except the end screen)

Reach the ladder to complete the level

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

In this 2D platformer you will control a squishy green character in a world of gray, hard squares. He is mocked for his difference, depressed by the darkness, unable to be himself. It is your goal as the player to naviguate this harsh world and reach happiness, greatness and fulfilment. The message here is that no matter who or where we are, we can be happy and successful, we just need to believe and act towards that goal.

Have fun ! All feedback would be absolutely awesome !
